item.title: Day 4: Celebration
item.description: So yes I didn’t post yesterday, which though normally my reaction would be like:

item.title: Day 2: On Brokenness
item.description: Maybe you and I were never meant to be complete

item.title: Day 1: Slamming Into Lent
item.description: So today marks the opening day of a series I want to write about for Lent.

item.title: How to Start a Blog, For Under 2$ A Month
item.description: So this is my blog. I wanted to create one, but I’m also a bit of a nerd, so I decided to do this in the most effecient way I could, which as is often the case, involves messing around with technologies that I’m familiar enough with, but need some serious hands-on time.
